import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Todo from './Todo' import { TodosContext } from '../contexts/TodosContext' import { ThemeContext } from '../contexts/ThemeContext' export default function TodoList() { const { state } = useContext(TodosContext) const { theme } = useContext(ThemeContext) const mainColor = theme ? "light" : "dark" const background = theme ? "dark" : "light" return ( state.length ? {state.map((todo) => )}
